comments.body:
Change to:

This parameter enables users to extract the last valid state and properly padded outputs, so it is provided for correctness.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +581,585 @@    sequence_length: (optional) An int32/int64 vector sized `[batch_size]`. Used
      to copy-through state and zero-out outputs when past a batch element's
      sequence length.  This argument enables this API to extract
      the last VALID state of RNN instead of a PADDED time step, so it is 
      for correctness.

@@ -1,1 +520,524 @@
  Returns:
    A tuple (outputs, output_states) where:
      outputs: A tuple (output_fw, output_bw) containing the forward and
        the backward rnn output `Tensor`.

comments.body: alignment is messed up here -- this seems unrelated to this commit, maybe put in a different PR?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +128,132 @@      if not dtype:
        raise ValueError("If no initial_state is provided, "
                           "dtype must be specified")
      state = cell.zero_state(batch_size, dtype)
